p: Due to the consumption of the fruits of coyotillo (Karwinskia humboldtiana), a poisonous shrub of the buckthorn family, outbreaks of “ buckthorn polyneuropathy” (giving generalized flaccid paralysis clinically mimicking GBS, sometimes leading to death by respiratory failure) were observed in 106 Mexican soldiers in 1918 and 16 Mexican children in 1951 [ 80]. It may result from a disruption of the metabolic activity of Schwann cells [ 80].
